title: Strengthening Organizational Development Practical Competencies: Designing Simulation/VR-Based Learning Tools

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for corporate management/HR/administrative staff

learning_goals: Learners will analyze the social context of historical events in three or more detailed stages using VR-based simulations.
Learners will compare Learning Designer and WebCollage tools to select appropriate representation methods (format/organization/support) for their learning designs.
Learners can collaborate with 4+ peers using digital tools to design simulations addressing 2+ social issues
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
